explanation: [0-0] A red brick wall with a recessed area. Inside the recess, a man in a red and black checkered shirt stands on brown steps, holding a hammer. To the left, green grass grows against the red wall, and a man in a yellow shirt and black shorts stands amidst the grass, looking right. The word "Friend" is below him. Green grass also grows against the red brick wall on the right, with red bricks piled on top. A blonde woman in a blue top stands facing left, with the word "Mom" below her. Brown soil lies in front of the red brick wall, and green plants grow on the wall.

[0-2] The man in the red and black checkered shirt continuously swings the hammer, and the steps beneath his feet rapidly extend to the left. Suddenly, the hammer disappears, and the man looks to the right.

[0-2] The man in the red and black checkered shirt continuously swings the hammer, and the steps beneath his feet rapidly extend to the left. Suddenly, the hammer disappears, and the man looks to the right.
[2-5] The man in the red and black checkered shirt faces right and waves his hands. The woman in the blue top shakes her head and crosses her arms over her chest.

[5-9] The man in the yellow shirt on the left throws a red brick at the man in the red and black checkered shirt and then crosses his arms over his chest, watching. The man in the red and black checkered shirt turns to look and shakes his fists at the man in the yellow shirt. The man in the yellow shirt gives a thumbs-up to the man in the red and black checkered shirt. The woman in the blue top angrily puts her hands on her hips and turns to the right, looking back in the process, then turns again.

[9-16] The man in the red and black checkered shirt continues to swing the hammer downwards, and the steps beneath his feet rapidly ascend in a curve, ultimately reaching a yellow platform. The man in the red and black checkered shirt opens his mouth in excitement and pumps his fist in the air.
